DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare effect spinal morphine dose 0.05 mg 0.1 mg amount morphine first 24 hour postoperative .
DOC.brief_title: 0.05 mg Versus 0.1 mg Spinal Morphine Reducing Morphine Requirement After Vaginal Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: Female ASA 13 Undergoing vaginal hysterectomy with/without anterior posterior vaginoplasty Can operate PCA device History allergy study drug History bleeding tendency History infection back Patient refuse spinal anesthesia History CAD CVD
